title: Worst Relationship Advice
itunes:title: Worst Relationship Advice
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what was the worst relationship advice our listeners received after Gabriel Union opened up about the advice she gave Ayesha Curry when she was in a fresh relationship with her now husband Steph Curry. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man who was caught with his side chick and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
